comment.body:
> [synczero](#comment_1_13fJ2vnsCAcCEri9FaY6tUwyfUEgRJdvVg): Someone should update the Docs?".. in index.html file to automatically compile and merge all .coffee file within the js directory to a single all.js file."It does NOT automatically compile and merge. 
> "GET http://127.0.0.1:43110/xxxxxx/js/all.js 404 (Not Found)"
> Also .. compile by myself:cat ZeroChat.coffee lib/ZeroFrame.coffee | coffee --compile --stdio >./all.js"all.js:5 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'prototype' of undefined"
> Did someone work on this site, or whats going on here?

Did you tried to install coffee script with: `$ npm install -g coffee-script`?
This steps worked fine for me, I am working on Macos.

Cool!! It is working!!!! 

This is my p2p "chat" 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KsUsiGqo4CVzZZnpfdgm3JD5LkSV4C8WB 

no spam, just to see if really works, please write something :P
